hymn.title: I belong to Jesus
hymn.category: Assurance and Joy of Salvation—Redeemed by the Blood
hymn.chords: | C - C7 - | F - F/A - | G - G/B - | C - F/C - | C - C7/E - | F - Dm - | G - G7/B - | F/C - C 0 |

layout.singingstanza: I be -- long to Je -- sus; I am not my own; All I have and all I am Shall be His a -- lone.

lyrics.stanza: I belong to Jesus; He is Lord and King, Reigning in my inmost heart Over everything.
I belong to Jesus; What can hurt or harm, When He folds around my soul His almighty Arm?
I belong to Jesus; Blessed, blessed thought! With His own most precious blood Has my soul been bought.
I belong to Jesus; He will keep my soul, If the deathly waters dark Round about me roll.
I belong to Jesus; And ere long I'll be With my precious Savior there In His royalty.
